wiki.summary: PARTYNEXTDOOR reunites with his OVO label boss Drake on “Loyal,” an ode to their significant others. They reflect on their respective love lives and the loyalty that their women display. On November 19, 2019, PND hinted at an upcoming release via an Instagram post, where he used the caption “Friday.” Two days later, he teased Drake’s involvement via his Instagram story hours before its release. During the week ending December 7, 2019, “Loyal” debuted at #63 on the Hot 100. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: PARTYNEXTDOOR reunites with his OVO label boss Drake on “Loyal,” an ode to their significant others. They reflect on their respective love lives and the loyalty that their women display. On November 19, 2019, PND hinted at an upcoming release via an Instagram post, where he used the caption “Friday.” Two days later, he teased Drake’s involvement via his Instagram story hours before its release. During the week ending December 7, 2019, “Loyal” debuted at #63 on the Hot 100. During the week ending April 11, 2020, the song peaked at #60. “Loyal” was certified gold by the RIAA on April 16, 2020. Read more on Last.fm.
